name: Elemental (Prototype in development)
description:
Description:

Small action game (think Hollow Knight) where the player can empower itself through the elements to become stronger. [In development] You can choose between the 4 different elements, each giving you a different power. 

No art or sound has been created yet, will be added later on.

Controls: 

Arrow Keys - Move
Z - Attack (Can attack in 4 directions)
X - Dash
Space - Jump

Made by:

Marc Torres Martínez
